name: Mina Ryad
summary: Results-oriented C++ Software Engineer with extensive experience in embedded systems and automotive software engineering. Skilled in designing, developing, and testing software components for advanced automotive infotainment systems. Recognized for achieving high customer satisfaction in 2023.

experience.title: C++ Software Engineer
experience.description: Contributed in developing and testing the VAL software component for Volkswagen Infotainment, implementing new features and enhancing connectivity ECU performance. Executed software V-cycle and implemented Agile/Scrum methodologies. Utilized C++ 14, C, Python, Java, Jenkins, Docker, JIRA, Bitbucket, Git, and Microsoft Teams.

experience.title: Embedded Software Engineer
experience.description: Enhanced system efficiency and reliability in the Queueing System Project.

experience.title: Project Engineer
experience.description: Managed multiple HDD sites within government mega projects. Successfully executed a soil freezing project at the metro tunnel.

experience.title: Maintenance and Production Engineer
experience.description: Oversaw maintenance operations, ensuring production efficiency and safety. Optimized production plans, increasing productivity across three lines.

education.degree: Bachelor’s Degree in Mechatronics and Robotics Engineering

AI and Data Science Introduction, Epsilon Institute (Online) (August 2020 – January 2021)
Embedded Systems Diploma, IMT School (November 2018 – March 2019)
Testing Essentials, TestPRO for Software Testing Services (December 2018)
